summary: The memecoin market cap has increased by over 27% in the past 24 hours, outperforming the rest of the cryptocurrency market.
title: Memecoin market cap soars by over 27% in the past 24 hours
content: The memecoin market cap has increased by over 27% in the past 24 hours, significantly outperforming the rest of the cryptocurrency market, which posted an uptick of over 5% during the same period.
According to CoinGecko data, the market cap of memecoins currently stands at $34.7 billion.
